title: Strike Witches: Operation Victory Arrow
synopsis: Operation Victory Arrow is set in the period between the end of Operation Mars in the second television series and the 2012 Strike Witches movie. The three 30-minute short stories depict the lives of the members who returned to their respective homes.
characters: ['Hartmann, Erica', 'Lucchini, Francesca', 'Barkhorn, Gertrud', 'Bishop, Lynette', 'Clostermann, Perrine H.', 'Yeager, Charlotte E.', 'Wilcke, Minna-Dietlinde', 'Marseille, Hanna-Justina', 'Hartmann, Ursula', 'Planchard, Amelie']
